items.title: Who will win the battle of U.S. retail media?
items.description: Investing.com -- Walmart (NYSE:WMT), Costco (NASDAQ:COST), and Target Corporation (NYSE:TGT) continue to race to capture a larger slice of the fast-growing U.S. retail media market, which could double to $100 billion by 2028 and account for nearly one-fifth of total media ad spend.

items.title: How did the hyperscale clouds do in Q1 2025?
items.description: Investing.com -- In a note to clients on Monday, Bernstein analysts said the hyperscale cloud market remains on a strong, long-term growth path, with generative AI now taking center stage as the primary revenue driver.

items.title: Amazon.com, Inc. (AMZN): Jim Cramer Discusses Alexa Plus In Detail
items.description: We recently published Jim Cramer Recently Discussed These 11 Stocks & Said The Robots Are Coming. Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) has appeared frequently on Cramer’s morning show recently. Most of the time, he has discussed the firm’s Alexa assistant and outlined that an Alexa […]
